PhD summer school DK2010 Students Team

In order to know better each other it will be nice to have the picture, name and the relevant aspect of your PhD.
For privacy reason this page will be open only to the students which will be participate in the summer school.
Of course the picture is not compulsory, and also as name a nickname can be used.
The nickname will be so used to refer to a person during the 2 weeks of course.
